content: In the kickoff webinar for Connectathon 24, the presenters linked to https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/226195-Covid-19-Response and said that stream should be used. Is that still true, or should this stream be used? Thank you!

It's possible that I got confused, maybe the webinar I was on was specifically for this track: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-05+Situation+Awareness+for+Novel+Epidemic+Response
So that other stream looks like it's specific to that track, and this stream is for the Connectathon in general. Is that right?
